name: Gunjae Koo
content: Computer System Architecture Lab Search CSArch @ Korea University Welcome to the Computer System Architecture Lab. Undergraduate interns: If you are interested in joining CSArch Lab to pursue a Master’s or a Ph.D., it is highly recommended to participate in the intern program of CSArch Lab. For detailed information, please contact Prof. Gunjae Koo. Open positions: We are recruiting self-motivated students who want to work on computer architecture and system research. If you are interested in joining CSArch Lab, please contact Prof. Gunjae Koo. You can apply to the following graduate programs at Korea University. (Application deadline: October 02, 2025) Computer Science and Engineering Computer Security AI Applications Semiconductor System Engineering You can download the lab introduction flyers from the links below: Research highlight (Kor) Lab introduction (Kor) Latest News Narae and Arka have joined CSArch Lab One paper accepted to IISWC 2025 One paper accepted to ICCD 2025 Prof. Gunjae Koo will be serving on the program committee for HPCA 2026 Seongpil presented at 2025 IEIE Summer Conference See all posts CSArch Lab is generously supported by the following sponsors: Meet the lab members → Cite × Copy Download
